name: Caterpillar (itch) (kuzmaka)
description:
Help the tiny caterpillar to achieve the next stage in her life.  

Short metroidvania-like action-adventure game created during Metroidvania Month 18 jam.

Controls (gamepad controls in brackets)

  • Move - A, D or arrows (stick)
  • Jump - Z or space (A)
  • Attack - X (X)
  • Special ability - C (Y)

Author

Kuzma Kudim

Music

https://opengameart.org/content/india-rythm

https://opengameart.org/content/crickets-ambient-noise-loopable
